Articles.Content:
I apologize for the fiasco with the pictures... I am terrible at this kind of thing! Thanks for you patience.

I proudly Present my first Compilation of crafts! I have been playing for a few months now but I just started getting serious about Spaceplanes 8) I have yet to do so with my rockets!

The Legion Pack of Spaceplanes comes with multiple planes in it, separated by their class.

Scout: Low altitude rockets that generally focus on agility and speed.

Legion: Low-mid-high altitude craft with varying roles, generally slower and more cumbersome but with more range.

Icarus: High altitude space craft, slow and cumbersome, but with A LOT further range.

IMPORTANT: The gravity bomb mod is employed on a few of the craft! It can be found here and is a nice addition to the game for aesthetics. I use all stock parts otherwise

http://www.jaanus.cc/files/wing+bomb.rar

PICTURES:http://imgur.com/a/4AkIK

Icarus Class Freighter:

The Icarus Class Freighter is a high altitude freighter. It is rather laggy on some PCs because of it\'s huge size! But it\'ll get you rocket up there if you want it too!

Icarus class Glider:

This was a special project of mine, a high altitude glider It actually works really well and you can go huge distance with it if you\'re so inclined. But be warned, once you begin to lose control you\'re pretty much screwed! 0_o

Legion Class Bomber:

The bomber is one of my favorites but be careful with take offs The Gravity bombs mod is needed with this one but it\'s so satisfying to bomb a rocket on the launch pad

Legion Class Fighter:

Fast, agile, and it has bombs! Every Kerbal\'s dream! Once again the mod is needed This thing is fast, 700 mph fast, or 200 mps for you puritans

Legion Class Freighter:

This thing is hell-a-fun to fly! It\'s very quick to react to your controls but it\'s slow and tends to flip if you botch the take-off ???

Legion Class Recon:

This plane is my personal favorite! It is a fantastic trick plane and that\'s why it has a panic system built in! Two taps of your space bar and it deploys four parachutes to catch you and it has and engine guard so you can take it for another spin! Did I mention it\'s fast? 8)

Legion Class Transporter:

It\'s probably the most boring plane in the collection but it\'ll do the job

Scout Class Fighter:

Small, fast, and agile. You know what to do 8)

Well that covers it! Thanks for taking a look at The Legion Pack! I hope you have fun messin around in these! If you have any questions or suggestions leave a reply below
